005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model;
007
008import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
009
010public interface IModuleLoader<M extends IModuleExtended<M, ?, ?, ?, ?>> extends ILoader<M> {
011  /**
012   * Used to define a post-processing operation to perform on a module.
013   */
014  @FunctionalInterface
015  interface IModulePostProcessor {
016    /**
017     * Perform a post-processing operation on the provided module.
018     *
019     * @param module
020     *          the Metaschema module to post-process
021     */
022    void processModule(@NonNull IModule module);
023  }
024}
